First, we read the corpus.
```{r, eval = FALSE}
model <- keyATM_read(texts = quanteda_dfm,
                     extra_k=3,
                     keywords=keywords_list,
                     mode="basic",
                     options=list(seed=225))
```

We visualize keywords before fitting the model,
```{r, eval=FALSE}
model$visualize_keywords
```

We fit the model.
```{r, eval=FALSE}
fitted <- keyATM_fit(model, iteration=1000)
post <- keyATM_posterior(fitted)
```
